Property.Name: CheckExpressionScript
Property.Value: [max_tasks]>(0)

Property.Name: CheckExpressionScript
Property.Value: [time_task_related]='Someday' OR [time_task_related]='This Week' OR [time_task_related]='Tomorrow' OR [time_task_related]='Today'

Property.Name: CheckExpressionScript
Property.Value: [status]='Completed' OR [status]='In Progress' OR [status]='Not Started'

Property.Name: CheckExpressionScript
Property.Value: [eisenhower_status]='Not Urgent & Not Important' OR [eisenhower_status]='Urgent but Not Important' OR [eisenhower_status]='Not Urgent but Important' OR [eisenhower_status]='Urgent & Important'

Property.Name: CheckExpressionScript
Property.Value: [repeat_frequency]='Custom' OR [repeat_frequency]='Annually' OR [repeat_frequency]='Monthly' OR [repeat_frequency]='Weekly' OR [repeat_frequency]='Daily' OR [repeat_frequency]='None'

Property.Name: CheckExpressionScript
Property.Value: [term]='Short-Term' OR [term]='Medium-Term' OR [term]='Long-Term'

Property.Name: CheckExpressionScript
Property.Value: [total_units]>(0)

Property.Name: CheckExpressionScript
Property.Value: [status]='Canceled' OR [status]='Done' OR [status]='On-Hold' OR [status]='In-Progress' OR [status]='Not-Started'

Property.Name: CheckExpressionScript
Property.Value: [repeat_ends]='After Occurrences' OR [repeat_ends]='On Date' OR [repeat_ends]='Never'

Property.Name: DefaultExpressionScript
Property.Value: ('None')
